
[2000] <= 0;
[2001] <= 0;
R0 <= 0;  --> default

			//11101000
	
R1 <= [1000]            //00000011 11101000
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c	//01000111 11010000
[2000] <= R1 		//00100111 11010000
R1 <= [2001]		//00000111 11010001
R1 <= R1 + R0 + c	//10010100
[2001] <= R1 		//00100111 11010001

R1 <= [1001] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1002] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1003] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1004] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1005] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1006] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1000] 
R1 <= R1 + [2007]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1008] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c

R1 <= [1009] 
R1 <= R1 + [2000]+c
[2000] <= R1 
R2 <= [2001]+R0+c
